title: SLA Reporting - Generate Monthly Report
description: An account manager needs to generate the monthly SLA and performance report for a key client.

tasks.description: Generate the standard monthly performance report from the PSA tool for the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is generated showing ticket volumes, response times, and resolution times.

tasks.description: Analyze the report to confirm that all SLA targets for the month were met.
tasks.expected_outcome: The account manager confirms that all response and resolution time SLAs were achieved.

tasks.description: Add a summary to the report and send it to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client receives their monthly performance report.
